CustomField.formula:
IF(ISBLANK( In_Meeting__c ),null,
IF((MOD(( In_Meeting__c /60)/60,1)*60) >= 10,
TEXT(FLOOR( ( In_Meeting__c/60 )/60)) + "h : " + TEXT( FLOOR(MOD(( In_Meeting__c/60 )/60,1)*60)) +"min",
TEXT(FLOOR( ( In_Meeting__c/60 )/60)) + "h : 0" + TEXT( FLOOR(MOD(( In_Meeting__c/60 )/60,1)*60)) +"min"
))
CustomField.label: Total In Meeting
